titles.title: Day Is Dying in the West

verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God of Hosts! Heav'n and earth are full of Thee! Heav'n and earth are praising Thee, O Lord most high!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord of life, beneath the dome Of the universe, Thy home, Gather us, who seek Thy face, To the fold of Thy embrace, For Thou art nigh.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: While the deep'ning shadows fall, Heart of Love, enfolding all, Thro' the glory and the grace Of the stars that veil Thy face, Our hearts ascend.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When forever from our sight Pass the stars, the day, the night, Lord of angels, on our eyes Let eternal morning rise, And shadows end! Amen.
